sentences.en: Some priests have to forswear marriage.
sentences.cn: 有些祭司必须宣誓放弃婚姻.

sentences.en: The judge asks sharply: " Do you know to forswear what result can you get? "
sentences.cn: 法官严厉地问: “ 你知道作伪证会得到什么结果 吗 ? ”

sentences.en: The party was offered a share of government if it forswore violence.
sentences.cn: 若发誓停用暴力，这个政党即可得到部分行政权。

sentences.en: The priests of some religions must forswear wealth and marriage.
sentences.cn: 有些宗教的祭司必须宣誓放弃财富和婚姻.

sentences.en: Wells was not likely to forswear the faith of a lifetime.
sentences.cn: 威尔斯决不会背弃他毕生的信仰.

sentences.en: You must tell the truth to the judge, because if you forswear yourself you could go to prison.
sentences.cn: 你必须向法官说老实话, 因为你如果作伪证就可能坐牢.

phrases.tran_cn: 发伪誓；作伪证；违背誓言

trans.tran_en: If you forswear something, you promise that you will stop doing it, having it, or using it

trans.tran_cn: 发誓抛弃，坚决放弃，发伪誓，作伪证
